titleStmt.title: A booke called in latyn Enchiridion militis christiani, and in englysshe the manuell of the christen knyght replenysshed with moste holsome preceptes, made by the famous clerke Erasmus of Roterdame, to the whiche is added a newe and meruaylous profytable preface.
Enchiridion militis Christiani. English
titleStmt.author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
Tyndale, William, d. 1536.

publicationStmt.publisher: By wynkyn de worde, for Iohan Byddell, otherwyse Salisbury, the. xv. daye of Nouembre. And be for to sell at the sygne of our Lady of pytie next to Flete bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Iohan Byddell, otherwyse Salisbury, the. xv. daye of Nouembre. And be

place.placeName: the sygne of our Lady of pytie next to Flete bridge
